text:
Nylas | San Francisco, CA + NYC | Full-time + Remote | https://nylas.com | Developer Success Engineer $80-110k

Hey folks! I'm hiring another developer success engineer to join our team of 3 here at Nylas. We're a fast growing company with 34 awesome people.

DSE: https://jobs.lever.co/nylas/96a06eac-35df-40c8-9f33-635f7251...

We take our culture seriously: https://www.keyvalues.com/nylas

See our handbook: https://github.com/nylas/handbook

Email me: mike@nylas.com and apply at the link above
